jx.jx_en_mean: benefit from two incompatible ways of thinking or behaving

lj.lj_ly: countries cannot have it both ways: the cost of a cleaner environment may sometimes be fewer jobs.
lj.lj_ls: 国家难以二者兼得，因为更加清洁的环境有时意味着较少的工作机会。

entry.def: You use both when you are referring to two people or things and saying that something is true about each of them.

example.ex: She cried out in fear and flung both arms up to protect her face...
example.tran: 她吓得大叫，并且抡起双臂护住了自己的脸。

example.ex: Put both vegetables into a bowl and crush with a potato masher.
example.tran: 把这两样蔬菜都放进一个碗里，然后用捣土豆器把它们捣碎。

entry.def: You use the structure both...and when you are giving two facts or alternatives and emphasizing that each of them is true or possible.

example.ex: Now women work both before and after having their children...
example.tran: 现在妇女在生孩子前后都要去工作。

example.ex: Any such action would have to be approved by both American and Saudi leaders.
example.tran: 任何这样的行动都必须获得美国和沙特领导人双方的批准。

means.word_mean: 1. (used with count nouns) two considered together; the two;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old Norse báthir

sentences.cn: 不过,两者都被视为当前乱世中的安全港.
sentences.en: Yet both are perceived as havens of safety in a troubled world.

sentences.cn: 我发现,同时读双语读物和听有声教程能使两者都得到加强.
sentences.en: I've found reading and doing the audio lessons concurrently enhances both experiences.

sentences.cn: 你花了很长时间去搜寻的大多数天体都很暗弱, 很小, 或两者都是.
sentences.en: Most of the time you'll be hunting for things that appeardim, small, or both.

sentences.cn: 我认为二者都在起作用.
sentences.en: I think a combination of both was at play.

sentences.cn: 二者都同样是遥远和空虚的.
sentences.en: Both are equally remote and vacuous.

sentences.cn: 二者都授予文科和科学本科学位.
sentences.en: Both offer undergraduate degrees in the art scientist arts and sciences, for example.

sentences.cn: 当然, 答案是二者都有道理.
sentences.en: The answer, of course, is both of them.

sentences.cn: 石笋在钟乳石下面,它们二者都在增长, 最终会合.
sentences.en: A stalagmite is below a stalactite and they both grow, eventually to meet.

sentences.cn: 从身体上能够看见光环, 或从心理上感觉到它, 或者二者都可以.
sentences.en: Auras can be seen physically, or sensed psychically, or both.

sentences.cn: 方铅矿和自然铅,虽然一种是由化合物构成, 另一种是由单元素构成, 但它们二者都是矿物.
sentences.en: One is a compound, the other an element, yet both galena and native lead are minerals.

sentences.cn: 该理论提出, 可计量的收入和可计量的消费二者都包含有一个恒常性的部分和一个暂时性的部分.
sentences.en: Both measured income and measured consumption, the theory suggests, contain a permanent and a transitory element.

sentences.cn: 口头用法和俚语二者都是在口头语里比在书面语里更加常见.
sentences.en: Both colloquial usage and slang are more common speech than in writing.

sentences.cn: 二者都不满足于 “ 渐进修补 ” 和 “ 摸索前进 ”.
sentences.en: Both parties are disstisfied with " piecemeal tinkering " and " muddling through ".

sentences.cn: 巴特里奇的诚实和他的理解力不相上下,这二者都专用在小事情上.
sentences.en: The honesty of Partridge was equal to his understanding and both dealt only in small matters.

sentences.cn: 人类和猿类的共同性在于二者都是灵长类动物.
sentences.en: The common feature of human beings and apes is that they are both primates.

sentences.cn: 民主和集中之间,并没有不可越过的深沟,对于中国, 二者都是必需的.
sentences.en: There is no impassable gulf between democracy and centralism, both of which are essential for China.

sentences.cn: 在可能的情况下,通过减小回路的面积并避免磁场,使得A和都为最小.
sentences.en: Keep both A and constant by minimizing and movement , and keeping circuits awayand RF fields.

sentences.cn: 这项发明很快就开始盛行,传遍日本乡村和都市.
sentences.en: This innovation quickly caught fire and spread throughout both rural and urban Japan.
